Position.Title: Premier's Sporting Challenge Advisor
Position.BriefRoleStatement: Supporting the development and implementation of the Premier’s Sporting Challenges in Primary School and with particular responsibility for the delivery of the Sports Leadership Program.
Position.StatementOfDuties:
• Coordinating the development and implementation of the Premier’s Primary School Sport Challenge and assisting in
  • Coordinating the development of technology based programs to support the operation of the Premier’s Sport Challenges.
  • Developing and producing resource materials to support the Premier’s Sporting Challenges.
  • Establishing collaborative partnerships with individuals, key stakeholders and government and non-government agencies on matters relating to the Premier’s Sporting Challenges.
  • Preparing advice, correspondence and briefings on matters related to the Premier’s Sporting Challenges.
  • Providing high level advice on the implementation, management and operation of the Premier’s Sporting Challenges.
  • the development and delivery of the Premier’s Secondary School Sport Challenge.

SelectionCriteria.Criteria: Teaching qualifications and recent school based experience within the K-12 range
Demonstrated commitment to participating in and managing accreditation processes
Proven ability to liaise and negotiate with a range of stakeholders and work collaboratively within and across teams
High level written and oral communication and interpersonal skills and experience in the preparation of documents including briefings, reports and correspondence
Experience in the management of systems to analyse, record, manipulate, store and retrieve data
Proven ability to meet deadlines, provide sound advice and work independently
Demonstrated capacity to ensure that projects are delivered on time, within budget and in accordance with agreed quality standards
Demonstrated ability to develop, plan and implement strategic initiatives and innovative practices that support education change for improved student learning outcomes
Knowledge of and commitment to the Department's Aboriginal education policies
